casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Marwin MCKOY, Defendant-Petitioner. C-699 September Term 2017
080271 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 19, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004138-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
